Dear #patient#
Enclosed is the neurostimulation information kit that you requested. This kit contains a video and brochure that were designed to provide information about chronic pain and neurostimulation, including what it is, how it works, and what it takes to receive a system. We hope you find the information helpful.
When you are ready to discuss your treatment options, you can use the enclosed list to find pain management doctors in your area. These doctors have training in the diagnosis, treatment, and/or rehabilit ation of people with chronic pain and are familiar with neurostimulation procedures.
To prepare for a doctor's visit, it may be helpful to write down questions you have about neurostimulation and prioritize them by what is important to you. To help you do this, we have included a discussion guide in the Frequently Asked Questions section inside this kit.
We encourage you to use our Power Over Your Pain website (PowerOverYourPain.com) to learn about neurostimulation, read patient stories, and understand ho w chronic pain affects people. You can also use the site to connect with actual neurostimulation patients through our Patient Ambassador Program.
If you have questions about neurostimulation, feel free to contact us by emailing contact@sjmneuro.com or by calling 1-866-990-PAIN (7246).
Sincerely,
The Power Over Your Pain Team
